description:
Rinne`s school holds their school festival. Rinne works at the cafe with Sakura, when they sense something ominous. Just then, a blonde wig flies at them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Katsura no Munen to Kabocha no Yuuwaku
Les regrets d`une perruque et la citrouille tentatrice
The Wig`s Disappointment and the Pumpkin`s Temptation
カツラの無念とカボチャの誘惑
